name: English (UmaTL)
short_desc: Translates all parts, with a focus on lore & accuracy. Terms might change and not match community. Source: Original. Contributors: noccu (+ maintainer), LotoDS, CatNipHoarder + Holo, Chiwawa, Kasey, … (tinyurl.com/UmaTLCredits)

name: English with Skill Data (UmaTL SD-EN)
short_desc: Standard UmaTL, but replaces skill descriptions with numerical effects and conditions. Source: UmaTL. Contributors: noccu

name: Skill Data Only (UmaTL SD)
short_desc: Replaces skill descriptions with numerical effects and condition. No translations. Contributors: noccu
